name: What if your girl was a frog 2
name_original: What if your girl was a frog 2
description:
The girl looked longingly at the thick rain. She dreamed of the creatures she loved so much. Frogs are different, green and yellow, big and small, but one thing is for sure, they are so cute! The girl made up her mind and ran through the rain in the direction of her dream!

Easy win: Keyboard Сtrl+D - Complete Level

In the game, your goal is to complete the puzzle with the frog girl to restore the pictures. (─‿‿─)♡


FEATURES

  • 🐸 Beautiful artwork
  • 🐸 Animation scenes
  • 🐸 CG Gallery Mode
  • 🐸 Relaxing music
  • 🐸 Сomics story
